title: In the Shadow of Midnight: Daedalus, A tale of Savannah
description: On September 19, 2005, the heat waves danced off the teeming, blackened windows of a small wooden house in the city’s Trustee’s Garden section. Inside lay the bodies of Bob and Tina Stoddard, decaying in the Savannah swelter. This is their story.
author: Albert Davenport
